title: Stop Looking For Clash Teams Here Please.
body:
Stop shitting up the place. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
No one wants to play that dumb gamemode that Riot made to trick you into playing their game and, in time, giving them your money.

Clash threads belong in the Clash section:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/clash
